name: Exercise 1
text: Create two local variables named a and b and assign the values 5 and 3, create a third variable named c and assign the addition of the first two.

name: Exercise 2
text: Which day of the week (as number) do we have today?

name: Exercise 3
text: In this exercise you have to define a function and it must be named 'GetDayName'. The function has one parameter which is a number and it returns a string. The function gets the number of the current weekday and returns its name as string. After you defined this function retrieve the number of the current day and pass it as a parameter to the function. As a result you should see the name of the current day.
